Class Time

Object

      Time
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable, Serializable
public class Time
extends Date

A Date without the year-month-day components.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
Time()
          Constructs a new Time using the present time.
Time(Date d)
          Constructs a new Time by stripping the day components from d.
